bio.short: Giants of All Sizes are a 4-piece genre-bending band from the Philadelphia area. We play all kinds of music from funk to metal. If you can't find one song you like then you probably hate music.
bio.long:
Emerging from the suburbs of Montgomery County, Giants of All Sizes represents a new generation of Philadelphia rock. The quartet - Tommy Crotty (drums), Jakob Stein (guitar), Dylan Renner (bass), and Calvin Cooper (vocals/multi-instrumentalist) - refuses to be boxed into a single genre, instead creating a sound that spans from funk grooves to metal intensity.

Formed in 2023, the band quickly developed a reputation for their high-energy live shows and eclectic setlists. Currently, they are harvesting the best musical fruits from Montgomery County, and preparing to deliver them directly to your streaming service of choice.

Their debut demos showcase the band's versatility and commitment to pushing musical boundaries while maintaining an infectious energy that gets crowds moving.

members.name: Tommy Crotty
members.bio: Hi, I'm Tommy! I mostly play drums but I can also play mallet percussion, and I like to pretend I know how to play guitar sometimes. The things that keep me going are my cat and Jakob Stein.
members.influences: After Midnight – Blink-182, Holiday – Green Day, Zombie – The Cranberries

members.name: Jakob Stein
members.bio: My name is Jakob Stein. I am a multi instrumentalist with a focus on guitar. I like to make weird music.
members.influences: The Wheel - IDLES, Flimsier - King Krule, Little Dipper - Hum

members.name: Dylan Renner
members.bio: My name is Dylan Renner, I'm a multi instrumentalist with a focus on bass and guitar. I write songs sometimes and I enjoy alternate tunings and weird time signatures.
members.influences: All for You - Chestnut Grove, Endless nameless - Nirvana, At the turf fields - Giraffes?Giraffes!

members.name: Calvin Cooper
members.bio: Hi, my name is Calvin, and I am a multi instrumentalist and vocalist, and am motivated by my love of God and epic beats.
members.influences: Disenchanted – MCR, Down in the Valley – The Head and the Heart, Bossa Nova Corps – Origami Angel

achievements.achievement: Built dedicated fanbase in Montgomery County area
